# fitDTVARMxID

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan 2026-01-07

## Description

Fit the discrete-time vector autoregressive model for multiple
individuals using the `OpenMx` package.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `fitDTVARMxID` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID) with:

``` r

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID")
```

## More Information

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/fitDTVARMxID) for
package documentation.

## References

Hunter, M. D. (2017). State space modeling in an open source, modular,
structural equation modeling environment. *Structural Equation Modeling:
A Multidisciplinary Journal*, *25*(2), 307–324.
<https://doi.org/10.1080/10705511.2017.1369354>

Neale, M. C., Hunter, M. D., Pritikin, J. N., Zahery, M., Brick, T. R.,
Kirkpatrick, R. M., Estabrook, R., Bates, T. C., Maes, H. H., & Boker,
S. M. (2015). OpenMx 2.0: Extended structural equation and statistical
modeling. *Psychometrika*, *81*(2), 535–549.
<https://doi.org/10.1007/s11336-014-9435-8>

R Core Team. (2025). *R: A language and environment for statistical
computing*. R Foundation for Statistical Computing.
<https://www.R-project.org/>

# Package index

## Functions

- [`FitDTVARMxID()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/FitDTVARMxID.md)
  : Fit the First-Order Discrete-Time Vector Autoregressive Model by ID
- [`LDL()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/LDL.md)
  : LDL' Decomposition of a Symmetric Positive-Definite Matrix
- [`Softplus()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/Softplus.md)
  [`InvSoftplus()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/Softplus.md)
  : Softplus and Inverse Softplus Transformations

## Methods

- [`coef(`*`<dtvarmxid>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/coef.dtvarmxid.md)
  : Parameter Estimates

- [`converged()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/converged.md)
  : Check Model Convergence

- [`print(`*`<dtvarmxid>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/print.dtvarmxid.md)
  :

  Print Method for Object of Class `dtvarmxid`

- [`summary(`*`<dtvarmxid>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/summary.dtvarmxid.md)
  :

  Summary Method for Object of Class `dtvarmxid`

- [`vcov(`*`<dtvarmxid>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitDTVARMxID/reference/vcov.dtvarmxid.md)
  : Sampling Covariance Matrix of the Parameter Estimates
